nodes.text: The Industrial Sector was a region of the Darkside district of the planet Coruscant. The area contained a lot of industrial machinery and specialized in re-forming scrap materials from Darkside's Recycling Sector and the upper levels of Coruscant, to turn them into usable building materials. Circa 19 BBY, the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar traveled to Darkside and hid his starship, a Republic Sienar Systems Star Courier, inside a building located on the corner of the Industrial Sector.
